title: Sleeping President, Jay-Z and Dame, Jesse Jackson, Gap Band and more.
itunes:title: Sleeping President, Jay-Z and Dame, Jesse Jackson, Gap Band and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Big Dog talks about his bus pass and almost a $1 trillion in payback to RW. The CLO knows toys and Shirley is shocked! We pray for the family of Gap Band Co-Founder Ronnie Wilson. Big Dog is guilty of doing a Joe Biden! The King gives us his Mount Rushmore of Comedy. Something bad happened in Las Vegas. Would You Rather had to do with looks or personality. Rev. Jesse Jackson is back at Howard University to help the students improve their on campus living conditions. Jay-Z and Dame spark an important business discussion. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve makes a reference to Bill Gates and his story.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
